key.name: app-launch-counts
key.summary: Count of app launches indexed by app id
key.description: A table of apps that have been launced and the total count. Used for sorting apps.

key.name: window-width
key.description: Width of dialog window in pixels.

key.name: window-height
key.description: Height of dialog window in pixels.

key.name: post-launch-sleep
key.summary: Wait time for app launch to occur
key.description: Microseconds to wait for launching app before exit.
